caption.title: Climate change and planetary boundaries, inspired by Rockstrom et al. 1 2.
caption.p: We use the planetary boundary 1 2 on climate change: a CO 2 concentration of 550 ppm as an objective for 2100 and a concentration of 350 ppm for 2100. The temperature-limited scenario, based on Copenhagen conference, complies with this planetary boundary. The “2010” scenario uses as initial point the baseline scenario in 2010. The “2025” and “2035” scenarios starts respectively in 2025 and in 2035 using the baseline scenario as initial conditions.
